name: Amasty
overview: Amasty is one of the leading Magento extensions developers. We offer more than 70 professional Magento extensions and solutions which will suite for each eCommerce business. Our Magento certified developers provide only high-quality Magento solutions for eCommerce. Working since 2009 we’re proud to announce, that we have improved more than 35 000 Magento stores. Our developers put theirs whole soul to each extension, that’s why our Magento extensions have a big amount of helpful features, which bright Magento stores in to a new level. Our company is also well-known by our customer support service and quick question solutions. We help web store owners make money and facilitate their daily work.
